attributes.additional_details:
The selling of football tickets for profit is illegal so why not music events??
It is infuriating and disheartening that genuine music fans try for hours to get tickets and see them appear minutes later on sale online at greatly inflated prices.
Stone Roses tickets were appearing on eBay for over £300 within minutes of them going on sale. The UK should be proud that we attract some of the greatest music acts in the world, but lets make sure they are available for the real music fans.
